item.title: A New Home On The Internet
item.author: Author
item.description: A New Home On The Internet The internet is full of information. In this day and age we have an overabundance of information. Why would I want to add even more to it? And why would anybody take notice into what I'm writing? Previously I only had a website on RobinDeNeef.com, it's a website I made while searching for a job and finding freelance clients. I didn't update it for more than a year.
